english: Let's go.
Sola!
I can't stand it anymore.
Wait.

text: ...olacağı düşman hacıdım. Senin gibi yiğidin elinde haksızlığa uğrayanların sesi olsun. Gazabı olsun inşallah.
english: ...the enemy will be. May the voice of those who are in injustice......be the voice of a brave man like you. May it be a wrath, God willing.
Zulfikar is the best, Kılıç.

text: Ali'den gayrı yiğit olmaz Deli Demir. Oy seni veren Allah'a kurban.
english: Ali is the best, Deli Demir. God bless you, my God.
For God's sake.
I will carry my father's name with honor.
Let me go.
What's up?
Your shoes are still wrinkled.
What's the matter?
They are getting ready.

text: Tamam ocak hayvan mı kaldı bu kıtlıkta?
english: Is there any animal left in this famine?
You are right.
I'll ask for your permission.

text: ...obayı diriltip çıkacak çare bulsak iyi olacak ha.
english: It would be better if we found a way to revive the tribe.
He will leave tomorrow's council.

text: Kış gelmeden bu yayladan göçmezsek hepimizin hali Arap.
english: If we don't leave this place before winter comes, we will all be in trouble.

text: Ama sen bir çare biliyorum diyorsan...
english: But if you say you know a solution...

text: Şöyle de biz de bilelim ha.
english: We'll know when we can.

text: Bu mevzuları en iyi ağabeyim Gündoğdu bilir.
english: My brother Gundogdu knows these things best.

text: İstersen sen onunla konuş. Gündoğdu, olmaz. O zaten ser verip sır vermez.
english: You can talk to him if you want. Gundogdu? No way. He is a servant. He won't hide anything.

text: Kırk hak çevirip aldığın şey bu mu? Bunun adı haritadır.
english: Is this the thing you took after turning 40? This is called a map.

text: Ne işe yarar? Bak şimdi. Biz buradayız. Ama...
english: What is it for? Look, we are here.
Right where these mountains are.
This is Aleppo. This is Baghdad.
This is the hall of glory.

text: Burası da sultanın sarayının olduğu Konya. Sen şimdi sultanların, emirlerin sarayını boş ver de......oba nereye göçecek, ondan haber ver Gündoğdu. Beylerin basireti bağlanmış. Babandan ses soluk çıkmıyor.
english: This is Konya, where the Sultan's palace is. You should give up the palace of the sultans and emirs......and tell me where the tribe will move to, Gundogdu. The Beys have the authority. Your father is not a big deal.

text: Öyle gamlı baykuş gibi tüner durur otağında.
english: He is standing there like a wild boar.

text: Neresi burası? Yarın herkes toyda öğrenecek.
english: Where is this place? Everyone will learn at the headquarters tomorrow.

text: Oldun değil mi? Söyle hadi neresi?
english: You found him, didn't you? Tell me where he is.
Huh?
Turu!

text: Ava çıkıyorum abi. Avın sırası mı şimdi? Yarın toy var.
english: I'm going hunting, brother. Is hunting time now? There is a headquarters tomorrow.

text: Toy senin abi benim olsun abi.
english: The election is yours, brother. Let it be mine.

text: Eyvallah. Tamam fazla uzaklaşma. Tez git, tez dön.
english: Okay, don't go too far. Go fast and turn fast.

text: Bamsı ne o bastırma? Ava gidiyoruz unuttun mu? Avda seni aç bırakmayız merak etme. Ava çıkıp da aç kalana yiğit mi dönür Turgut? Maksat yolda nefsimiz körelsin ya. Senin nefsini körelteceksek vay halimize.
english: What are you talking about, Bamsi? We are going hunting, remember? We won't leave you hungry in the hunt, don't worry. Is it a brave man to go hunting and be hungry? Our goal is to make our souls be blind on the road. If we are going to blind your soul, we are in trouble.
Come on, come on, come on.
Yours is going.
If you shout,
I said
You gave me a chance, Ustad-i Azam.
That honor belongs to us.
Thank you.

text: Umarım yolculuğunuz iyi geçmiştir. Her şey yolunda mı Titus?
english: I hope you had a good trip. Is everything okay Titus?
We're more confident than ever sir.

text: Odalarınız hazır efendim. Yemekten önce biraz dinlemek ister misiniz? Elenora dinlensin. Bizim işimiz var komutanım.
english: Your rooms are ready, sir. Would you like to rest before dinner? Let him rest. We have things to do, commander.
As you wish.
With your permission.
What is the situation of the prisoners?
I assigned a soloist.

text: Numan ve ailesini Kara Toygar'a teslim edecekler.
english: They will hand Numan and his family over to Kara Toygar.
I waited for you for others.
What is it?
What are they doing dad?
I'll take care of the palace.

text: Orada özgür olacağız değil mi o vakit?
english: We'll be free there, won't we?
...until the end, son.
Endless.
That's how they beat up the Konya with our fate.

text: Doğduğumuz büyüdüğümüz sarayda amcamın yanında... Sana da kardeşinin de bir şey olmasına izin vermeyeceğim kızım.
english: I want to be with my uncle in the palace where we were born and raised. I won't let anything happen to you and your sister, my daughter.
...and we are all connected to it.

text: Sultan Alaaddin'in gözüne girmesi çok önemli.
english: ...is very important for Sultan Aladdin.

text: ...Toygar'ın Selçuklu Sarayı'nda üst düzey vazife alması...
english: ...and Toygar's high-level duty in Selçuklu Palace...
...will breathe.

text: Ve her şeyi hallettik efendim. Tamam.
english: We will take care of everything.
...in the morning.

text: Türkmen aşiretler vergilerini ödüyor mu? Onları zaptır aptaltın alamıyoruz komutanım. Sürekli hareket halindeler. En büyük aşiret hangisi? Kayılar komutanım. Moğol istilasından kurtulup gelmişler. Beyi kim? Süleyman Şah.
english: I pay the taxes of Turkmen tribes. We can't take them under control commander. They are always on the move. Which is the biggest tribe? Kayılar, commander. They escaped from the Mongol invasion. Who is the mayor? Suleyman Shah.

text: Kaç çadır? 2000 çadır. Ama çok iyi talpire sahipler. Vergisini öder mi? Öderler komutanım.
english: How many tents? 2000 tents but they have very good talp. Will they pay their taxes? They will, commander.

text: Bu yıl vergilerini daha erken ödesin o vakit.
english: To us. Then, pay your taxes earlier this year.
But commander, you heard what I said.

text: Bu devlet nasıl ayakta duracak? Derhal yöredeki tüm aşiretlere haber salın. Peki komutanım.
english: How will this state stand? Inform all the tribes in the region immediately. Yes, commander.
Where are these Templars?
Zulf.
Let's rest here for a while.
You've been around.

text: Başlı sefere öncesi Selçuklu'nun gücünü kırmalıyız.
english: We must break the Seljuk's power before the main campaign.

text: Selçuklu Sarayı'na daha çok adam yerleştirmelisin Titus.
english: You should have more men in the Palace of the Seljuks, Titus.

text: Tüm sarayı ele geçireceğimizden emin olun.
english: Make sure we capture the palace.

text: Papalıkta bir grup......aşlı seferleri için gönülsüz...
english: A group called the papacy is heartless for their love affairs.
I was not surprised at all.

text: Tüm Avrupa'yı harekete geçirecek bir plan hazırlamalıyız.
english: We need to prepare a plan that will make Europe move.
We have to succeed.
The world of the Crusaders will unite...

text: Kudüs için harekete geçmeli. Bunun için de Müslümanları kışkırtıp...
english: He must take action for Jerusalem. He must provoke Muslims...
We must pull it out.
I have valuable prisoners.
We can start with them.
Calm down son.
...to hell.

text: Bizi bir an önce ulaştır da ölmeyi bu kadar çabuk istiyorsun ha?
english: Get us there as soon as possible. Do you want to die so soon?

text: Şu güzel kızınla genç şehzadeni acır.
english: I will make your young Shahzada suffer with your beautiful daughter.

text: Bizim için kendini bu kadar üzme. Bizimle ittifak etseydin...
english: Don't upset yourself so much for us. If you had allied with us...

text: Selçuklu sultanı olacaktın. Biz de yolumuza bakacaktık. Siz bana papanın kölesi olmayı teklif ettiniz. Biz sana barış...
english: You were going to be the Sultan of the Seljuk Empire. We were going to look for our way. You offered me to be a slave of the Pope. We offered you peace...

text: Ve yeni bir dünya düzeni sunduk. Beraber olalım istedik. Ama...
english: And we proposed a new world order. We wanted to be together. But...
...the blood of the Muslims will always be shed.

text: Bundan kurtulamayacaksınız. Hem de ittifak ettiğimiz Müslüman dostlarımızla akıtacağız kanlarınızı.
english: You won't be able to get rid of that. And we will shed our blood with our Muslim friends whom we have allied with.
You won't make it.

text: Sonucunu göreceğiz. Hem bu arada cehenneme yolladığım adamlarınıza.
english: We will see the result. By the way, tell your men I sent to hell...
...say hello to Bissol.

text: Bölge güvenli efendim. Güzel. Atlara su verin.
english: The region is safe, sir. Good. Give the horses some water.
Give these too.
Come on.
Take it out and sit down
Send the prisoners!
Go!

text: Kardeşini al, kaçın diyorum size! Baba!
english: Brother, get up. I'm telling you.
See you now.
The first Crusaders fell to the ground.
It's a shame.

text: Başarırsak tüm bu coğrafyanın sınırları değişecek.
english: If we succeed, the borders of this whole geography will change.

text: Kudüs'ümüzün kurtuluşu için tarikatımızın servetini harcamaktan da çekinmemeliyiz.
english: We shouldn't hesitate to spend our wealth for the sake of our......safety and the salvation of our Jerusalem.
We are ready to spend all the treasure.

text: Genç erkekler için yeni bir Kudüs seferi, zenginliğin en kolay yolu.
english: A new Jerusalem for young men is the easiest way to wealth.

text: Haçlı ordusunun bir neferi olabilmek için oluk oluk orduya akacak.
english: ...will be sent to the army to be a member of the Crusader army.
The Thalans, the Benedicts, the Marcellians.

text: Hepsi bu karnaval için yanıp tutuşacaklar.
english: They will all burn for this carnival.
Okay.
The brilliant princes of Europe.
How can we trust them?
While Muslims have fallen into each other...

text: Bu kez işimiz zor olmayacak Titus. Ya Selçuklular efendim?
english: This time our job won't be easy Titus. What about the Seljuks sir?
Anatolia.

text: Sultan Alaaddin'in hükümdarlığında en parlak günlerini yaşıyor.
english: He's living his brightest days as Sultan Aladdin's ruler.

text: Türklerle Selahaddin Eyyubi'nin torunlarını birbirine düşürdüğümüz gün...
english: The day we brought the children of Selahaddin Eyupi and the Turks together...
...we will reach our goal.
The truth will be ours.
Come on.

text: Başımızın çağrısına bakarız. Birazdan hava kararacak.
english: We'll look for him. The weather will get cold soon.
The jackals must have already smelled the blood.
Bamsi Bey, Zogan.
Bring the horses.

text: Bir alayaçlıyı tepelemek kolay, hadi bakalım. Ertuğrul şimdi yandı. Yananı Allah görür karındaşım. Yandı ki ne yanmak. Hadi.
english: It's easy to climb a cliff. Come on. Ertugrul is on fire now. God sees the one on fire, my friend. What's the use of burning when it's on fire? Come on.
I don't know.
I said we wouldn't come.
We owe you a life.

text: Bir gün öderiz. İsmini bağışla. Kayı boyundan Ertuğrul.
english: We will pay you one day. Forgive me for my name. Ertugrul from Kayi tribe.
As you wish.
God help us.
Good luck.
Let's go. Is your tribe far away?

text: Bu da kara gündeki Akakçe bitmiştir Afşin kardeş. Fezgahımızı kurarız. Baktık işler kesat. Hemen yola çıkarız.
english: The Aq Aqja in Karagun is over, Afsin brother. We'll set up our camp. We'll get to work as soon as we're done.

text: Selamun aleyküm kolay gelsin. Aleyküm selam.
english: Peace be upon you. Good luck. Peace be upon you.
Welcome.
Welcome, Gazanfer Aga.
You brought good news to Kayi tribe.

text: Ey gidi kurdoğlu kardeşim benim. Her daim dirisin maşallah. Bu bozkır adamı diri mi tutar ki Kazanfer biz de diri olalım? Yoo öyle deme. İyisin iyisin maşallah.
english: My dear Kurdoglu brother. You are always strong, thank God. Does this bozkır man think he can win? No, don't say that. You are good, thank God.
Where is the caravan? It's at the bottom of the Karakaya.
From Suleyman Shah.

text: Pazarda tezgah kurmak için destur almaya geldim.
english: I came to get permission to set up a counter on the market.
How is he?
Thank God.

text: Kayının ihtiyaçlarını karşılayalım. Göç olmadan bir eksiği kalmasın dedi. Var olasın Gazanfer. İnşallah umduğunu bulursun.
english: He said that we should meet the needs of the Kayi. He said that we should have a shortage before we emigrate. May God help you, Gazanfer. I hope you find what you want.

text: Eyvallah. Süleyman Şah'ın müsaitse ziyaret etmek isterim.
english: Thank you. If Suleyman Shah is available, I would like to visit him.

text: Beyimize Gazanfer Han'ın geldiğini haber verin.
english: Inform our Bey that Gazanferah is here.
subscribe

text: Başakçadır bu. O dünsüz beyim ben yardımcı olurum.
english: Is this Basak? I helped that homeless man.
Thanks.

text: İman hiç yabancı gelmedi bana. Obanıza ilk gelişim beyim. Birine benzettiniz herhalde.
english: I didn't see any stranger in your tribe. It's my first time in your tribe, my Bey. You must have made me look like one.
Thank you.
Peace be upon you, Suleyman Shah.
Peace be upon you, Tacer. Welcome.
You brought us good news. Come in.

text: Süleyman Bey'im şu gözlerim sizi bir daha gördü ya ne mutlu onlara Bey'im. Hediyelerimi kabul buyurun Bey'im. Bunları sizin için Konstantinopolden getirdim.
english: Suleyman Bey, my eyes have seen you again. I am so happy for them. Please accept my gifts, sir. I brought them from Constantinople for you.
You have been hardworking.
Kurdoglu.

text: Bunları ihtiyacı olanlara dağıt. Bahis Dine Bey'im.
english: ...and distribute them to those in need. As you wish, sir.
Okay.

text: Anlat bakalım o gözler başka diyarlarda neler gördü? Sağır olaydım da işitmez olaydım. Gözlerim oylaydı da görmez olaydım beyim. Hayırdır?
english: Tell me, what did those eyes see in other lands? I would be deaf but I wouldn't hear. My eyes would be blind but I wouldn't see, sir. What's wrong?

text: Sultan Alaaddin Konya'yı toparladı. Ancak kaçak şehzadelerin başına iş açmasından korkar. Latinler Konstantin'i viran eyledi. Tüm Ortodokslar şehri terk edilir. Düzen bozuk, huzur yok. Bir de kıtlık başlayınca tam çaresiz kalmış insanlar. Haçlı kılıç artıkları bir hareketlilik içindeymiş bunu duymuştuk.
english: Sultan Aladdin has recovered Konya. But he is afraid of the illegal princes starting a business. The Latins have abandoned Constantine. All the Orthodox have left the city. The order is bad, there is no peace. And when the famine started, people were desperate. We heard that the Crusaders are now in a state of mobilization.
They will make a mess again.
What about the priests?

text: Aç karınlarını doyurmak için yine yollara düşeceklermiş.
english: They will go back to the road to feed their hungry bellies.

text: Papazın Avrupa'daki prensleri Haçlı seferleri için çağrıda bulunduğu söylenir beyim.
english: The priest said that the princes in Europe are calling for the Crusades.

text: Biz Müslümanlar da birbirimize kılık çekelim.
english: We Muslims will fight each other.
Let's make some difference.
Let's lighten the fire of seduction.
Fire everywhere from Anatolia to Basra.
This fire will also shoot us.

text: Aman ateş demeyin fena oluyorum beyim. Mallarımı obada satmak için sizden destur almaya gelmiştim beyim.
english: Don't be angry, I'm not, sir. I came to buy my goods from you to sell them in the tribe.
I'm sorry.
Thank you.
Kara Toygar.

text: Türkmen göçerleri hizaya sokmak için bölgeye gelmiş. Desene zorlu günler bekler bizi.
english: He came to the region to put the Turkmen refugees in order. Tell him that we have hard days ahead of us.

text: Bu kız da Venedikli, Rosalina. Asilzadedir. Beyaz ten, yeşil göz. Böylesi az bulunur komutan. Üstelik kelepir. Elim darda şu vakitler. Böylesi hem senin için hem benim için bulunmaz fırsat.
english: She is from Venice, Rosalina. She is a princess. White hair, green eyes. She is rare, Commander. And she is a slave. I am in a tight spot at this time. So, there is no chance for you or me.

text: Ya şuna ne dersin komutan? Yunan adalarından kaçırmışlar. Tazelik ve güzellik fışkırıyor her yerinden. Vahşi bir kısraktır.
english: What do you think about this, Commander? They kidnapped him from the Greek islands. He is all fresh and beautiful. He is a wild rascal.

text: İzzet, ben eğittim. Adının tadını bilen, efendisi için. Ya şu sarışın?
english: I raised him. He knows the taste of his name. For his master. What about that old man?
I must say you are very enjoyable, Commander.

text: Onu haçlı kılıç artıklarından aldım. Gemiyle getirmişler. Sırtmış. Erkeklerin hizmetinden yiyanlar. Kes!
english: I took him from the Crusaders. They brought him with a ship. He was a Serb. He was a good man for men. Cut!
Come here.
Come on.
You need not be afraid of me.
Now, to the Master.
You chose the most expensive one, Commander.
But it's worth it.
The Crusaders.
The Crusaders are attacking.
Damn.
You cannot reach him.
We couldn't make it, sir. You couldn't make it?
Thank you.
We have a wounded man.
Bamsi!
Come on, come on.
You're fine, right?
We are all good, my dear.
They were attacking.
He is a good ear.

text: Sonra anlatacakmış beyimiz. Yakında çıkar ortaya.
english: He will tell you later, my Bey. It will be revealed soon.
Who are these?

text: ...kıltına gelmiş Kılıçdare Bey'si. Neyse ki meşe yaprağı kanamayı durdurmuş. Yoksa alimallah kaybederdik.
english: ...to the ground. Unfortunately, the pine tree stopped bleeding. Otherwise, God forbid, we would have lost him.

text: De be kadın, hemen sıcak su getir. Hemen Akçakoğlu'ya.
english: Tell me woman, bring me some hot water. Yes, Akcakoca.
The leg is also bad.

text: Ama biz önce şu yarayı halledelim.
english: But first, let's take care of this wound.
Akcakoca will take care of the rest.
We'll wait on the side.

text: Babamı yalnız bırakmayalım abla. Merak etme.
english: Let's not leave my father alone, sister. Don't worry.
Your father is in your hands.
Thank you, my son.
God has brought you here.
We are sorry for your loss. You're welcome.
You'll take a breath.
You have food.
Where did the Crusaders take you?
subscribe
I don't know.
They did not.

text: Esir pazarına satacaklardı herhalde, babam tüccardır. Akdeniz'de esir düştük.
english: They must have sold it in the captive market. My father is a merchant. We were captured in the Mediterranean.
You should be a good trader.

text: Sizi bu kadar haçlı götürdüğüne göre...
english: Since you were taken to the mosque with so much pain...
We were rich.
But we have nothing left now.
Where is father?
You're in the Kayi Oba.
I am the Bey of the tribe, Suleyman Shahinoğlu.
We owe you three lives.
We want to get rid of the gang.

text: O halde bu adamı öldürürüm. Hayır. Seni satın alıp azat ederim. Komutanım sinirlisiniz. Hele bir sakinleşin. Kafa çeneni. Seni de gebertmeyeyim.
english: Then I will kill this man. I will buy you and free you. Commander, you are angry. Please calm down. Shut up. I will not kill you.

text: Efendim, çoluk çocuğuma başlayın beni. Beceriksiz herif.
english: Sir, let me start my journey. You incompetent man.
Do it!
I can't do it. I said do it!
You are crazy!

text: Sen de gel sofraya. Şu işimi bitireyim geliyorum ana.
english: Come to the table, mother. I will finish this job and come back, mother.

text: Her daim böyle ol aslan parçası.
english: Always be like this, lion's piece.

text: Vazifeni bitirmeden başka işlere koyulma. Selcan. Buyur ana. Pekmezi getir kızım. Getiriyorum ana. Nerede kaldı Gündoğdu? Çobanlara bakmaya gitmişti, gelir şimdi.
english: Don't get any other work before you finish your duty. Selcan. Yes, mother. Bring the molasses, dear. I am bringing it, mother. Where is Gundogdu? He went to see the herdsmen. He will be here soon.
Put another plate on the table.
For Sungurtekin.

text: Bir gün geri gelirse sofrada yeri olduğunu bilsin çocuğum.
english: He should know that he is at the table if he comes back one day.

text: Ne kaldı Gündoğdu? Gelir birazdan ana.
english: How is Gundogdu? He'll be here soon, mother.
You're back with a big sister.
It is a bit so, sir.
I have a brother.

text: Ovanın ortasında yıldırım çeken ağaç gibisin. Her türlü belayı üzerine çekiyorsun.
english: You are like a tree in the middle of the village. You are causing all kinds of trouble.
The Muslims were attacking.
We did what we could.
Who are they? What are they?
The Crusaders were captured.
He is a merchant.
It must be from the Antakya Crusade Corps, sir.

text: Şövalyeler Selçuklu toprağında böyle ellerini kollarını sallaya sallaya esir taşımazlar. Yani? Yani demem o ki Selçuklunun mutlaka bu esirlerden haberi vardır.
english: Knights don't carry their arms and hands like this in the Seljuk lands. So? I mean, the Seljuks must know about these prisoners.

text: İçlerinde Selçuklu askeri yoktu. Nasıl bir belaya bulaştığın er ya da geç ay yuka çıkacak Ertuğrul.
english: They did not have any Seljuk soldiers. You will be in trouble sooner or later, Ertugrul.
What should I do, brother?
Should I have left them alone?
Shut up.

text: Onları kayılara yaraşır bir şekilde ağırlayayım.
english: I weigh them in a way that suits the Kayis.
Let's see what the day will bring.
I'll change it.
It's over. You'll be fine.
Do I have permission?
Here you go, sir.
How is he?
From now on, it's up to God.
If you'll excuse me.
Come, girl.
My girl.
Turgut's father.
I wanted to ask if you need anything.
Thank you.

text: Zaten çok yük olduk size. Olur mu hiç öyle şey?
english: We are already very worried about you. Is that even possible?

text: Bamsı, Beyerek ve Doğan çadırlarını sizin için hazırlıyorlar. Gece orada kalırsınız.
english: Bamsi and Dogan are preparing their tents for you. You will stay there tonight.
I should stay with my father.
Take a rest tonight.
You look very miserable.

text: Baban yarın uyandığında size daha çok ihtiyacı olacak.
english: Your father will need it more when he wakes up tomorrow.

text: Merak etme babanın yanında ben kalırım.
english: Don't worry, I'll stay with your father.

text: Bence zaman nasıl büyüttün bu çıbanın sırtında.
english: How did you grow up with this?

text: Biz ne çivanlar büyüttük sırtımızda Hayme.
english: We raised so many children, Hayme.
Are we going to be afraid of the betrayal of this device?

text: Ama en başında etseydin başını bu belanın. Şimdi çoktan. Çakallar eskiden dağlardaydı. Şimdi obamıza kadar indiler. En ufak bir hatamda üzerime çullanmak için beklerler. Zayıflığımı bilip görmesinler diye saklarım.
english: But if you had been the first to suffer this, you would have... The jackals were in the mountains before. Now they have come down to our tribe. They wait for me to get a little bit of trouble. I hide it so that they do not see my weakness.

text: Ağızlarına laf vermektense susup acımla kavrulmak en büyük evladır.
english: ...is to be quiet and to be hurt rather than to talk.

text: Bari Akçakoca'ya söyleseydin. Söyledim hanımım, söyledim.
english: You should have told it to Akcakoca. I did, ma'am.

text: Bana şifa alacak bir merhem hazırlıyor.
english: He is preparing a potion for me.
We will spend the night with good luck.
No.
Do you think about our guests?

text: Bu fitilin ucu hangi istikandiri yakmıştır Hayme?
english: Which slipper did this fatso burn, Hayme?

text: Evet. Nasıl oldu? Çok güzel Aykız.
english: Are you dressed? Yes. How did it go? Very nice, Aykiz.
Wait a minute.
Oh my God.

text: Sanki saraylı bir melike gibi oldun Halime.
english: You look like a palace queen, Halime.
You look beautiful.
What happened?
Did I say something wrong?
I just came to tell you that.
Put on the headscarf.
Kurgut Alp took it from me.

text: Hay Allah niye verdin ki şimdi bunu bana?
english: Oh God, why did you give this to me now?

text: Çünkü sana çok yakışacağını biliyordum. Bakayım.
english: Because I knew it would suit you very well. Let me see.
It's good.
When is your wedding?
When we leave this place, God willing.

text: Zor değil mi böyle bir Alp'in karısı olmak?
english: Isn't it hard to be an Alp's wife?

text: Yüreği her an benim için atıyorsa zorluğun ne önemi var?
english: If you're throwing your heart out for me, what's the point of the difficulty?

text: ...Sahsalim obasına dönsün, başka bir şey istemem.
english: I do not want anything else but you to return to your home.
As long as I am not dead.
Let's braid your hair.
Do you have a boyfriend?
After my mother died...
Good motherhood.

text: Babamı yolda aşk etmekten başka bir şey olmadı hayatımda.
english: Nothing else than being my father's friend.
But anyway...

text: Hangi erkek benim gibi? Deninin zoruna bak.
english: Which man is like me? Look at your tongue.

text: Erkekler senin için birbirlerine girerler. Dünyanın altının üstüne getirirler.
english: Men are in love with each other for you. They make you the best man in the world.

text: En son ne zaman bir aynada kendine baktın sen?
english: When did you last look at yourself in the mirror?

text: Titus yavrunun kardeşi değil mi bu?
english: Isn't he the brother of the Cetus puppy?
Yes, sir. A sol.
Send these ashes to the Templars.
Now we will deal with Titus.
You, come in here.
Take this and go.

text: Hangi aşiretin bu damga? Kayılar efendim.
english: Which tribe is this? Kayis.
Kayı people.

text: Süleyman Şah'ın elindeyse, laf işimi zor.
english: Suleyman Shah is not in Mezor.

text: O çoban başı Selçuklu'ya kafa mı tutacak?
english: Will that shepherd man be able to keep his head up against the Seljuks?
Thank you, Ertugrul.
I brought you love.
Thank you, sister Gokce.
How is your wound?
He will wake up in a few days.

text: İnşallah. Allah şifa versin de başımıza bela olmasın yeter.
english: God willing. May God heal him and we don't get into trouble.

text: Birazdan ben de gelirim oradan kilimhaneye geçeriz. Tamam ayakız.
english: I'll come soon, we'll go to the laundry room. Okay, Aykiz.
I'll go to my mother.

text: İçeri girince sen de görürsün. Ateşi düştü.
english: You'll see when you get in. The fire is out.
We'll carry it to your tent in the evening.

text: Gördün mü kızı? Şimdiden avucunun içine almış Ertuğrul'u. Bundan sonra anca rüyanda görürsün.
english: Did you see the girl? She has already taken Ertugrul into her grasp. From now on, you will only see her in your dreams.
Did you feel comfortable?

text: Yıllar varken hiç bu kadar güzel uyumamıştım.
english: I have not slept so well for years.
You said that there were Templars in the forest.
Yes.
Who is that?
A sect that fights for the sake of Jerusalem.
They are very strong and ruthless.

text: ...Düsün'ün intikamını almaktan başka bir şey bilmezler.
english: They know nothing but taking the revenge of the dead.

text: Bu kadar güçlülerse sizden ne istiyorlar?
english: What do they want from you if they are so strong?
Is this the Seljuk lands? Yes.

text: Selçukluyla aranızda bir mesele mi var Halime?
english: Is there a problem between you and the Seljuks, Halime?
No, dear.

text: Koca Selçuklu'nun bizimle ne işi olur ki?
english: What can the Seljuk Empire do to us?
It's okay.
I'm sorry.
...in the market.

text: Her şeyi çok isteyince olmuyormuş baba.
english: when he wants something.
I learned that.
I'm sorry.
We were going to marry Turgut Alp when he emigrated.
We pulled the migration with rope.
Winter's hand is in your ear.
We still don't know where to move to.

text: Anlaşıldı. Senin de canın rahmetli anan kadar tezmiş.
english: Understood. You are as quick as your mother.

text: Hele bir bak bakalım, şu Uludağ'ın yaylasında kış geçer mi?
english: Look at this. It's winter in Uludaghi.
Why are you gathering?

text: Bütün beyler akın akın Süleyman Şahımızın otağına niye geliyor?
english: Why are all the Beys coming to Suleyman Shah's tent?

text: Oturacağız, konuşacağız. Bu mesleği çözeceğiz inşallah. Hadi sen tasala. Ver yeleği, geç kavanoz, hadi.
english: We will sit down and talk. We will solve this matter, God willing. Come on, don't be late. Come on.
I will not let you go.

text: Birazdan toy toplanacak Kurdoğlu. Kimse ne yapacağını bilmiyor. Evelallah hallederiz. Kurdoğlu, dağ sustu. Kırmaklar çağlamaz. Yağmurlar yağmaz olur. Kısıldık kaldık bu obada. Böyle giderse hayvanlarımız daha çok tereddüt olacak. Bebeler ölecek.
english: The headquarters will be gathered soon, Kurdoglu. No one knows what to do. We will take care of it. Kurdoglu, the mountain has stopped. The rain has stopped. We are stuck in this forest. If we go on like this, our animals will be more dangerous. The babies will die.
Alright.

text: Ne geçiyor aklınızdan? At sahibine göre kişiler Kurdoğlu.
english: What's on your mind? The horse belongs to its owner Kurdoglu.
We're talking to you. Put on your weight.

text: Süleyman Şah mecazsızdır. Bir ata bile sahip çıkamaz.
english: Suleyman Shah is a spy. He cannot even handle a horse.
It is Amnusian Kurdoglu.
Let's ride.
Damn it!
I came to get some healing grass for my husband.
It's out.

text: Ne istiyorsan söyle ben alıp getireyim sana. Yok daha sonra alırım.
english: Tell me what you want, I'll get it for you. No, I'll get it later.
Our guest. Mr Numan's daughter.
Welcome to our tribe, my dear.

text: Baban nasıl iyi mi? İyi. Çok sevindim. Allah şifasını versin. Ocağımız size her zaman açık. Bir derdin olursa hiç çekinme. Gel söyle tamam mı?
english: How is your father? Is he alright? He is fine. I am glad. May God heal him. Our tent is always open for you. If you have any problems, don't hesitate. Come and tell me, alright?
May God bless you, Mother Hayme.
Neither in heaven nor in earth.
...in the heart of a pious believer...
There is someone...

text: Varı bir eden Rahman ve Rahim olan Allah'ın adıyla.
english: In the name of Allah, the One and Only, the Most Merciful, the Most Compassionate.
Blue sky, the earth, the sun and the moon
Our family.
Our height...
Our tribe.
Our stove.
Our sons!
Our girls!

text: Bir olsun, hür olsun, diri olsun.
english: ...be one, free, and alive.

text: ...adalet dağıtan beyimizin huzurunda......toyumuz kutlu olsun. Amin.
english: May our assembly be blessed in the presence of our Bey who distributes justice. Amen.
...who makes you say yes...
...and the one who fills our hearts with faith...
In the 99 names of Allah.
Bismillah
I'm sorry.
You have brought us good news.

text: Çok şükür ki malları yola çıkarmadan önce obamıza bir tüccar geldi. Derim ki malları değerince tüccara satalım. Böylelikle yol masraflarından da kurtulmuş oluruz. Tek derdimiz mal olsa iyi beyim. Civar obalarda hayvanlarımızı otlatacağımız mera kalmadı. Su içemez, süt veremez oldu. Açlıktan telef olsun. Tez vakitte bir hal çaresi bulmamız gerek. Obanın halini ben de gördüm. Tüm civar beyleri haber saldık.
english: Thankfully, before we could sell the goods, a merchant came to our tribe. I say we sell the goods to the merchant as much as we can. So we can save money from the road expenses. It would be good if we had goods, my Bey. There is no need to plant our animals in the tribal tribes. We can't drink water or milk. We need to find a solution as soon as possible. I saw the situation of the tribe. We informed all the tribal lords.

text: Yurt istedik lakin kuraklık her yerde.
english: We wanted a home, but there is dryness everywhere.

text: Bir de Moğol eşkıhasından kaçan Türkmen boyları her bir tarafa dağılmış. Ne yapalım? Ottak için kardeşlerimize kılıç mı çekelim? Allah'ın rahmet hazinesi mi kesik beyim? Aylardır burada beklemekteyiz. Bir çare bulamamaktayız. Ne zamandır Kayı böyle çaresiz kalmıştır? Bize gidecek yurt mu yok? Bir hal çaresi bulmaz isek obayı nasıl tutarız ayakta? Ya ne zamandır? El rezek olan Allah unutulur olur.
english: And the Turkmen tribesmen who escaped from the Mongolian camp......are scattered everywhere. What should we do? Should we draw swords for our brothers for the wheat? We cut the treasure of God, my Bey. We've been waiting here for months. We can't find a solution. When has Kayi been so desperate? Is there no place to go to? If we don't find a solution, how can we keep the tribe alive? When? God is the one who is merciful. He will be forgotten.
Our mother is tired of patience.

text: Gökten ne iner, bize de o düşürür.
english: We will not be able to do anything.

text: Biz sabrın ne olduğunu yurtsuz gezerek öğrendik Deli Demir. Gayrı neslimiz yurtsuz kalmasın. Sabrın ne olduğunu anlatma bize. Ben ne vakit sizi çıplak bıraktım, aç bıraktım ki rızık için bu kadar telaşlandırsanız. Haşa beyim. Onu kastetmemiştim. Beyim sen bizi ne aç bıraktın ne de çıplak.
english: We learned what patience is by wandering around the country, Deli Demir. May our generation not be left without a home. Do not tell us what patience is. When did I leave you naked and hungry......so that you would be so anxious for the provision? No way, my Bey. I did not mean that. My Bey, you left us neither hungry nor naked.

text: Lakin bizde seni ne ersiz bıraktık ne de pusatsız.
english: But we left you neither without a man nor without a weapon.

text: Beyim biz deriz ki yeni bir yurt bulup
english: Sir, we say that we should find a new home...

text: Göçelim. Nereye? Ak koyunların can bulacağı her yere. Atatopraklarımıza göçelim. Moğol eşkıyasının da gücü kırılmış derler. Kim derse yalan der.
english: Let's migrate. Where? Everywhere the white sheep will find life. Let's migrate to our homeland. They say the Mongolian tribe's power is broken. Whoever says that is lying.

text: Moğol eşkıyası aç kurt gibi canavarlaşmış. Hiç mi bir çare düşünmedik beyim?
english: The Mughal gang became a beast like a hungry wolf. We didn't think of any solution, my Bey.
Aleppo.
I heard that...

text: Halep emiri El Aziz, Haçlı ordularına karşı kuvvet toplamaktaymış. Nedir yeğen gönlündeki?
english: ...the Ameer of Aleppo is gathering forces against the Crusaders. What is in your heart, nephew?
I say, El Azize...
Send an ambassador.
Tell him...

text: Sen bize oba ver......biz de sana pusatlı er verelim. Hem böylece...
english: Give us the tribe and we will give you a man with a sword. So that...

text: ...Haçlı ordularıyla savaşır, cenk eder, gazi oluruz. Hem de sonunda bir yuvamız olur.
english: We will fight against the Crusaders and become warriors. And we will eventually have a home.
Ali?
He must take action immediately sir.

text: Ne zamandır ben söz söylemeden harekete geçilir oldum?
english: When have I ever been in action without saying anything?
Don't mention it.

text: Şimdi odunun fikri kabul mü ağalar?
english: Do you accept the idea of wood, Aga?
That is correct.
I think it's appropriate.
I hope it's good. I hope so.
I hope so.

text: Peki elçi olarak kim gidecek beyim?
english: Who will go as a messenger, sir?

text: Şeyh Maşa, obandaki densizler şerefimizi iki paralık ettiler.
english: Hey, the rebels in your tribe have defiled our honor.

text: Obama yurt veren bir sultanın şerefi benim de şerefimdir Kara Toygar. Ne yapmışız da Sultan Alaaddin'in ve de komutanının şerefini iki paralık etmişizdir.
english: I am honored to be the Sultan who gave my tribe a home, Kara Toygar. We paid for Sultan Aladdin and his commander's honor with two pence.
This is the boat.
He was killed by the man you killed.
I forgot the stick.

text: Unutmuşum. Elçi olarak gelen birliğe pusa atıp...
english: I forgot. Throw a gun at the company that came as an ambassador...
You killed your knights.

text: Bununla da yetinmeyip, birliğin sultana getirdiği üç mahkumu kaçırmışsınız.
english: You missed three sentences that the Union gave to the Sultan.
Give these prisoners back.

text: Töremizi bilmez gibi konuşursun Kara Toygar.
english: You talk as if you don't know our tradition, Kara Toygar.
We will not hand over the guest to our tribe.
Especially if he is wounded.
I came here representing the Seljuk Sultan.

text: Sultanın emrine nasıl uyulursa benim de sözüme öyle uyulur. Aksi halde neler olacağını bilirsin Süleyman Şah. Biz töremizle yaşar, töremizle ölürüz Kara Toyga.
english: I will obey the Sultan's orders as well as mine. Otherwise, you know what will happen, Suleyman Shah. We live by our tradition, we die by our tradition, Kara Toyga.

text: Biliriz ki Sultan devletli adamdır. Ama önce Atamoğuz'un töresi der...
english: We know that the Sultan is a state man. But first, he says the Atamoğuz tradition...
He will be put on the throne.

text: Törebilmeyen adamdan sultan olmaz. Bey de olmaz. Adam da olmaz. Adam olmayanla da bizim işimiz olmaz. Koca Selçuklu'nun bir komutan olarak bunu bilmen gerekir.
english: A man who does not know how to do it cannot be a Sultan. Neither a Bey. Nor a man. We cannot do anything if there is no man. As a commander of the Seljuk Empire, you should know this.
I made my last promise to you.

text: Hadi var git. Sana edebimizle sorduk Süleyman Şah.
english: Go on, go! We asked you with our manners, Suleyman Shah.
You have two days off.

text: Sen vermezsen biz gelip almasını biliriz.
english: If you don't give it, we will come and take it.
Come on.

text: Sen Çuklu'yu karşına alma. Yoksa başınıza neler geleceğini bilirsin. Hah! Hah! Hah! Hah!
english: Don't you dare face Çuklu. Or you'll know what will happen to you. Come on! Come on!

text: Babam ne yapmaya çalışıyor? Ne yaptığını bilmeyecek kadar kocat artık.
english: What is my father trying to do? He is so old that he doesn't know what he is doing.
I told you that you would smell it.
Look what will happen next.
Stay here.
Go!
...the Messenger of God, the Master of the Prophets, the Master of the Prophets...
The head of Seljuk Sultan Alaaddin Keykubad.
The commander of the Kizimshahs...
No!
The right arm of the caliph is Omer.
No!

text: Şimdi tüm İslam dünyası intikam peşine düşsün bakalım.
english: Now, let the whole Islamic world seek revenge.
Then it's the priest's turn.
Who did this?
They fell into the ambush when they brought the prisoners.
Who?
Come on.

text: Ama kim olduğunu biz de bilmiyoruz.
english: But we don't know who he is either.
Come on.
Ertugrul!
You started this trouble!

text: ...üzerime gelme abi. Kafanın dikine dikine gitmekten ne zaman vazgeçeceksin sen? Hiç kimse umurunda değil. Ne baban, ne oban. Sen olsaydın ne yapardın? Sen olsaydın ne yapardın? Onları öylece bırakırıp çekip gider miydin? Benim tanıdığım Gündoğdu öyle bir adam değildir.
english: Don't come on me, brother. When will you give up going head to head? No one cares. Neither your father nor your tribe. What would you do if you were me? What would you do if you were me? Would you leave them and go away? Gundogdu is not such a man as I know him.

text: Benim tanıdığım Gündoğdu adaleti de insafı da çiğnemez. Adaletmiş, insafmış. Hangi adalet? Hangi insaf? Şu obanın haline bir bak! Çatır çatır çatırdıyor. Açlık her yerde. Kış kapıda nereye göçeceğimiz belli değil. Hayvanlar açlıktan telef oldu.
english: The Gundogdu I know will never be against justice and justice. Justice and justice. What justice? What justice? Look at the state of this tribe. It is so chaotic. Hunger is everywhere. It is not clear where we will go in winter. Animals are in need of hunger.

text: Adaletmiş, insafmış. Aç gözlerini artık! Aç gözlerini!
english: It is justice! Open your eyes now! Open your eyes!
Look around you!
Right in the middle of the headquarters!

text: Oba için hayati meseleler konuşulurken şu yaptıklarına bir bak.
english: While we are talking about life issues for the tribe, think about what I did.

text: Oba nasıl ayakta kalacak Ertuğrul? Nasıl?
english: How will the tribe survive, Ertugrul? How?

text: Bence dünya kime kaldı ki bize kalsın Ak Tolgalı?
english: Who cares about the world?

text: Bu yalan dünyada niye yaşamalı insan?
english: Why should this liar live in this world?
subscribe
Why should he wear a suit?
Why should we hold a sword?
Why should he keep the country?
It's the state.
Why is there a country?
Cruel man.

text: Adam vermezsek, Gökgür Bey başımıza yıkacakmış.
english: If we don't give him the man, he will kill Gokgur Bey.

text: Eğer verirsek Gökkupe başımıza yıkılmaz mı?
english: If we give it to him, we'll be in big trouble.
If I don't, my father will be in trouble.
What did I do, Ak Tolgalı?

text: Bir nefesine bile hükmedemediniz bu dünya için.
english: We couldn't even breathe for this world.
We will grow the neck.
Will we say goodbye to the tyrant?

text: O vakit de öyle susmaz mı?
english: Then he wouldn't be quiet like that.
Then our fire would be out.
Okay, I got it.
There is a good match.
...will do all kinds of evil.
He thinks about Aleppo very well.

text: Herkese zekânı gösterdiğin gibi vakti geldiğinde kimin bey olacağını da gösterdi.
english: You showed everyone your intelligence. You also showed who will be the Bey when the time comes.
We must first get rid of the trouble of Kara Toygar.

text: Babam töre dedi mi geri adım atmaz.
english: My father never steps back.
Oh, my God!
Look at the trouble you've caused us.
Don't convince my father.

text: Onu ikna edersek Ertuğrul da dize gelecek. Babanı tanımazmış gibi konuşursun.
english: If we convince him, Ertugrul will be on the top. You talk as if you don't know your father.
I wouldn't give it to you if the world were to fall.
What are we going to do then?

text: Babam beni Kara Toygar'a elçi olarak gönderdi.
english: My father told me to send me as an ambassador to Kara Torgara.
...for the sake of God.
Come on.
Ertugrul Bey.
Is there anyone?

text: Hayırdır kötü bir şey mi oldu?
english: What happened? Did something bad happen?
No.
I was going to talk about it today.
Kara Toygar is here.
He asked for us.
Yes, he did.

text: Bizim için obanın tehlikeye atma. Biz başımızın çaresine bakarız. Babam kendine geliyor. İki güne kalmaz yol alırız.
english: Do not put your tribe in danger for us. We will think of a way. My father is coming. We will take the road in two days.

text: Bütün cihan bir araya gelse......yine de sizi o zalimlere teslim etmeyiz.
english: If the whole world comes together......we will not surrender you to those cruel people.
Thank you.

text: ...Toygar'la kanlı bıçakta olursanız bunun vebali ağır olur. Merak etme.
english: If you are in the blood of a blood-thirsty man, this will be a big deal. Do not worry.

text: Biz Kayılar her türlü zorluğa göğüs germeyi iyi biliriz.
english: We Kayis know how to face any kind of difficulty.
I can't sleep.
For my son.
I was caught red-handed.
to fall in love.
I would not be able to survive if I fell.
I set the whole tribe on fire.

text: Düştüğün yere vardığında böyle olacağını bilir miydin?
english: Did you know that this would happen when you fell?
...that you will face that bastard's wrath.

text: Ya o komutan bozultusunun Haçlılarla bir olacağını bilir miydin?
english: Did you know that the commander would be in trouble with the Crusaders?
What about that Ceylan?
...with their children?
How could I do that?
I wouldn't, son.
I can't.

text: Ne ava giderken böyle olacağını bilirdin.
english: I didn't know it would be like this.

text: Ne de kendinle birlikte obayı ateşe atacağına.
english: nor will you set the tribe on fire with yourself.
What is there to say?
...or the ones in the tribe.
...for the sake of God.

text: Bu sınavda kül olmakta var, pişmekte var.
english: There is a coal in this test, there is a fire.
And the whispers inside him.

text: Bu obadaki haddini bilmezlere de hiç kulak asma.
english: And don't let them hear your nonsense.
You are our tradition's warrior, son.
...and the father's decisions.

text: Allah seni de babamı da başımızdan eksik etmesin ana.
english: May God keep you and my father safe, mother.
May God protect you, son.

text: Şunu da bunun baş ucuna koy.
english: Put the water on the tip of the head.
I brought some water.
I should have been you.

text: Bunu sana yapanların soyu tükenene kadar savaşacağım. Onlar toprağın dibine gidene kadar savaşacağım. Kanın yerde kalmayacak kardeşim.
english: I will fight until the people who did this to you are gone. I will fight until they go to the bottom of the earth. Your blood will not be left.
I promise.
If God is not with me for my revenge...
I will turn my face to the devils.

text: Müslümanların üzerine cehennemi taşıyacağım. Ben ölene kadar onların gazabı olacağım.
english: I will bring hell upon the Muslims. I will be their wrath until I die.
I promise.
Forgive me, father.
We agree, my Lord.
I didn't know how to interpret it.

text: Ama dün geceden beri içime de bir ateş düştü.
english: But I've been feeling a bit of a fever since last night.
Good luck, my Bey.
First, the hard days await us.
I'm sorry.

text: ...erçinin kim olacağına dair manevi emir vardır.
english: There is a spiritual command about who the messenger will be.
Bye.

text: Bir ihtiyacınız olursa Yiğit bize haber verir.
english: If you need anything, Yigit will let us know.
Ertugrul!
Yiğit told me everything.

text: Sen ve seni yetiştirenler Yaman'ı insanlarmış.
english: The ones who raised you and me are the people of Yaman.

text: Bizi kolladınız, korudunuz. Töremiz neyi gerektiriyorsa onu yaptık.
english: You protected us. We did what our tradition requires.
No debt.

text: Bu toprakların insanları töresine umut alı çok oldu. Senin gibi birine denk geldiğimiz için Allah'ın sevgili kuluymuşuz. Estağfurullah. Ben gideyim. Siz de istirahat edin.
english: The people of this land have been forgotten for a long time. We came across each other like you, so we were God's beloved servants. Don't mention it. I should go. You take a rest.
Let's go.
Listen to me well, Nalime.
You will find a horse for us today.
You will get ready with your brother.
Don't tell anyone.

text: Ne oluyor baba? Ne yapacağız? Gidiyoruz.
english: What is happening, father? What are we going to do? We are leaving.
Alem is no different.
If we stay here for one more day...
These people...
...and we'll make them go crazy.
I'm going to the backyard.

text: Tam toy önü, ahır da nereden çıktı Gündoğdu? Yeni getirdikleri ata bakacağım. Sen de Halep için hazırlıklara başla yavaş yavaş. Ben her şeyi hazır ederim etmesine de.
english: It's the day before the wedding. Where did the dowry come from, Gundogdu? I'll check on the horses they just brought. You start preparing for the wedding in Aleppo. I'll prepare everything for it.
Are you sure you will go to Aleppo?
Sturp
I am the one who brought the idea of Aleppo to the parliament.

text: Elçi olmak da bana düşer elbette ha?
english: I would be lucky to be the ambassador.

text: Öyle de. Ya öyle de böyle de. Sabah sabah ne bu huzursuz haller Selcan? Gideceksin diye mi içim yansın......babam seni göndermezse kırılırsın diye mi aklım kaçsın bilemedim.
english: Really? Really, really. What is this unhappiness, Selcan? I didn't know that you would go away just to make me sad......or that my father would break my heart if he didn't send you.

text: Tabii ki beni gönderecek. Başka kimi gönderecek?
english: Of course he will. Who else?
...and you feel sad...

text: Ben gidip gelene kadar sen de beni iki canlı karşılarsın.
english: You will welcome me with two lives until I come back.

text: Sen ahırda atlarla ilgilenirken, ben de burada sana yolu kazır ederken......o dediğin daha çok bekler Gündoğdu.
english: While you are busy with the horses in the barn......and I am preparing the way for you......Gundogdu is waiting for you.

text: Poydan sonra bakarım atlara o vakit.
english: I'll check the horses after the meeting.
Sir, may I?
Come Hamza, come.

text: Beyim, Süleyman Şah'ım sizi görmek istedi.
english: My Bey, Suleyman Shah wanted to see you.
Come on, Bismillah. Come on, Bismillah.
Bismillahirrahmanirrahim.
I decided to do it.
I have kids.

text: Sen de git hazırlan. İlyas Fakir'e de söyle, o da seninle gelecek.
english: You go and get ready. Tell Ilyas Fakir to come with you.

text: Lan bunu yapma dedim lan! Yaparsan ne olacak ha? Bak zaten ceviz kadar beynim var. Sebebin olmayayım ha? Aaaa! Cevizlik kabul sağlam! Korkma gel! Gel! Gel!
english: I said don't do this! What if I do? I have a brain as big as a walnut. I won't be your cause. The walnut is acceptable. Don't be afraid. Come on!
He called me to Suleyman Shah's tent.

text: Hayırdır inşallah? Bence ceylan avlamaya gitmiştik ha.
english: I think we went hunting for Ceylan.

text: Zeynep'in de maşallahı var ama avlanacak gibi değil.
english: Zeynep has some too, but it's not like she'll hunt them.
Get ready.

text: Hale mi gidiyoruz? Heyt be! Bamsı! Kardeşim! Bamsı! Kardeşim! Oturmakta kabahati pişti be!
english: We're going to the castle. Hey, man! Bamsi! My brother! Bamsi! My brother! Hey, man! I'm going to the castle in 30 minutes!

text: İlyas Fakah'a da söyleyin. O da bizimle geliyor.
english: Tell Elias Fakah about it. He is coming with us.
I brought the idea of Aleppo.

text: El Aziz'in askere ihtiyacı olduğunu da ben söyledim.
english: I told you that El Aziz needs soldiers.
Why wasn't it me father?
That's why, son.
I know.
I will do it, I said it.

text: İçindeki kibir putunu ne zaman büyüttün sen?
english: When did you grow your pride?
Am I arrogant?

text: Bütün oba açlıktan kırılıyor. Kıtlık her yerde.
english: The whole tribe is starving. The famine is everywhere.
We couldn't even get to a stream. Why?

text: Çünkü beyimizin çıbanla başı dertte. Haddini bil! Bırak Allah aşkına baba. Bütün oba halkı senin yaşlılığından şikayetçi.
english: Because our Bey's head is in trouble. Know your place! Leave it for God's sake, father. The whole tribe is complaining about your old age.
Move aside.

text: Kırk yaşı olmanın ağabeyinin hakkı olduğunu mu düşünürsün?
english: Do you think it is your brother's right to be a criminal?
Why me?
The fire of power he worships.
He took your soul.
I put out the fire.
When the fire comes into you...

text: Misafirlerimiz sen dönene kadar obada kalacaklar.
english: Our guests will stay in the tribe until you return.
I'm telling you...
Do not let your duty weaken.
Don't ever come back empty handed from Aleppo.
I have the Kayi's future on your shoulders.
...is the disaster of all of us.

text: ...Erazizin vereceği yurdun karşılığında bedeli ne ise verilir.
english: The price of the land will be paid for the land.

text: Ama hiçbir Oğuz kurbanlık koyun değildir.
english: But Oghuz is not a sacrificial lamb.

text: Şunu unutma. Senin Halep'te bir yurda ihtiyacın olduğu kadar...
english: Remember, as much as you need a home in Aleppo...

text: Halep emirinde Kayıların savaşçılarına ihtiyacı var. Başını dik tut.
english: The Kayi soldiers need you at the order of Aleppo. Keep your head up.
The one who knows what he wants...

text: ...hissiyenin hakkını veren gerçek bir Oğuz olduğunu göster onlara.
english: Show them that you are a real Oghuz who gives what he wants.
May God help you.

text: Hayatın pahasına vazifemi yerine getireceğim baba.
english: I will do my duty at the cost of my life, father.
I will come back without making you look bad.
What happened? Gundogdu!
Stop! Stop! I am coming, woman! Hamza! Help!
Don't!
Get out!
I'm sorry.
I'm Ertugrul's son.
I told you.

text: Bunlar kesin Hayme annenin aklıdır. Topunu yel alsın.
english: These are Hayme's thoughts. Let her take the ball.

text: Topunu yel alsın onların ben yapacağımı biliyorum. Hayır.
english: I know I will do it, so take your sword and take them.
Do not be angry.

text: Öfkeyle kalkan zararla oturur. Bırak Allah aşkına kadın bırak!
english: ...and the one who gets angry is the one who suffers the most. Leave her alone, woman!
Get your things ready. Be ready with your Alps.

text: O densiz kardeşin işleri eline yüzüne bulaştırdığı zaman......sen hakkın olanı alacaksın.
english: When that wretched sister does her job, you will take what is rightfully yours.
Don't forget.
The angels of death await you in the tent.
She got stuck in the trap, Turgut.
I can swallow you.
I can.

text: İlk defa ayrılırmışız gibi konuşursun Ay kızım. Ne vakit kavuştuk ki Turgut? Baba döşeğinde yol gözlemekle......koca döşeğinde el beklemek bir mi?
english: You talk as if we had separated for the first time, my dear. When did we meet, Turgut? Was it just waiting for a man in your father's bed and a man in your husband's bed?
It's not the pain of separation that is knotted in my throat.
...to not meet.

text: Ne vakit artık evleniyoruz desek hep bir sebepten ertelenir durur.
english: Whenever we say we're getting married, it always comes back to a reason.
Sister.
There is no delay this time.

text: Alep işi olur olmaz bilmiyorum ama
english: I don't know if Aleppo will be or not.

text: Yeni obanın ilk düğünü bizimkisi olacak. Sana söz veriyorum. Davulcular Aykız'la Turgut......nihayet evleniyorlar ey ahali diye haykıracaklar. Kilimhanedeki kızlar...
english: The first wedding of the new tribe will be ours. I promise you. The drummers will be shouting with the people......that Aykiz and Turgut are finally getting married. The girls in the church...

text: Obanın en güzel kızı evleniyor. Sıra bize gelecek artık diye seni gösterecekler.
english: The most beautiful girl of the tribe is getting married. They will show you that it's our turn now.

text: Sultan kızlarını bile çatlatacak güzelliğinle ayrılacaksın Deli Demir'in çalarından.
english: You will leave Deli Demir's tent with the beauty that will make even the Sultan's daughters burst.

text: Çok üzgün olduğumu söylemek istedim. Bilmiyorum hangi söz bu acıya karşılık gelir? Beni en iyi sen anlarsın Eleonora.
english: I wanted to say that I am very sorry. I don't know what kind of words will be used against this pain. You will take me best, Eleonora.
The ones who killed your father were Muslims.

text: Yolun açık olsun Titos. Dikkatli ol. Döneceğim enonara.
english: Be careful. I will, my lady.
See you.
Come on.

text: İyi bir komutanın gerçek bir tapınak çovalyesine dönüştüğüne tanık oldun hele Nurhan.
english: You have found out that a good commander has turned into a real Templar.
This is what Titus lacked.

text: İntikam yoksa saman askerden farkı kalmaz şövalyemin.
english: If there is no revenge, the horse won't be different from the straw soldier.
The death of the last one was the miracle of Tethys.
May God forgive Bishol's sins.

text: Diyelere bakılırsa Süleyman Şah yaptığı hatayı anlamış.
english: If you look at the other ones, you will see what Suleyman Shah did.
Our Bey loves the Seljuks. He counts them.

text: Ama bu işi ben çözebilirim Kara Toygar.
english: But I can solve this, Kara Toygar.

text: Verdiğim süre sabah olunca bitiyor kurdum.
english: I set it to end when the morning comes.
Otherwise, I will get rid of Seljuk's anger...

text: Tüm Kayı obası yanar bizimle birlikte.
english: The whole Kayi tribe will burn down with us.

text: Sen de yanarsın Kara Toygar. Ne küvetle? Sakın bana bu oğlanlardan Sultan'ın haber olduğunu söyleme.
english: You will burn too, Kara Toygar. Don't tell me that Sultan knows about these things.

text: Onları Süleyman Şah'tan zorla almak için elindeki asker sayısı yeterli değil.
english: The number of soldiers in his hands is not enough to force them to take them from Suleyman Shah.
You need to gather a huge army.

text: Kayı'yı ezip geçecek kudretli ordularınızın olduğunu biliyorum.
english: I know that you have powerful armies that will crush the Kayi.
You will.
But first...
The Sultan should know about this.
This is none of your business.
...we can't do anything about it.
Long story short...
I'm sorry.
...and for the sake of the tribe.
You must listen to me.
Since the purpose is to make business...
Tell me then.
Who did this?
Suleyman Shah?
Fuleyman Shah's son.
Ertugrul.
Bamsi, Dogan.
There is a job.
When?

text: Sabah ezanıyla birlikte Halep'e yola koyulacağız.
english: We'll set off for Aleppo with the morning prayer.
Are you ready?
Let's go.

text: Biz alpler her an her şeyi hazırız.
english: We Alps are always ready for anything.
I will.
It is easy to get used to everything.
Sometimes when I get used to difficult places.
...I won't burn you.
May God keep you alive.

text: Ayağına taş değmesin, su gibi git.
english: You should be on a rock. Go like water.
I can't believe it.

text: ...düşmüş misal uçarak götürürseniz vakitte beni geri getir obama o zaman.
english: Take him away by flying. Bring me back as soon as possible.
Your parents will be happy.
I'll be gone soon. You can't go.
I mean, why would I...
And your father can't get himself together.
May God speed you, Ertugrul Bey.
Who knows?
...in the name of God.

text: Bizim zoraki misafirler. Sultan Alaaddin'in akrabaları falan mı?
english: Our guests? Sultan Aladdin's relatives?
This is not about you.
He doesn't care about me at all.
Come on, grandpa.
What's on your mind?
...if you want to get what you want.
...I will have a small condition.
I don't know.
Don't worry.
God bless you, my Bey.
God bless you.
You are a great man.

text: Sen bu obada bana ne diyorlardın?
english: Why did you give me this father?
I need to think.
...and left me.
That's why.
May God bless you.

text: Halime de ailesi de bana emanet.
english: Halime and her family are my family.
You are a great man.
Yes, sir.
May God bless you.
...in the shoulders of the Lord.
Don't bow your head.
and you will be burdened with burden that you cannot carry.
May God bless you.
God speed, Ertugrul.
When you were paying your father for his rebellion...
I'm sorry.
I knew it.
Welcome.

text: Esirler umurumda bile değil Kara Toygar.
english: I don't care about the deputies, Kara Toygar.

text: Sizin topraklarınızla kaçtılar. Biz üzerimize düşeni yaptık.
english: They fled from your lands. We did what we could.
Give me the name of my brother's murderer.
I'm getting impatient to be a jinn.
Be careful.
Don't get caught up in the gallows, Kara Toygar.

text: Kendi beceriksizliğini sakın bana yıkmaya çalışma.
english: Don't try to destroy your own incompetence.

text: Övündüğün şövalyelerin birkaç kıçıkırık alpinin hakkından gelemedi.
english: The knights you praised could not win over a few heartbroken Alps.

text: Onun ismini vermek için benden ne istiyorsun? Sana.
english: What do you want from me to give her your name? To you.
I will give you more than you want.
I will hand him over to them.

text: Bu bir alacak verecek meselesi değil. İnandıyor musun?
english: This is not a matter of giving and taking. Do you believe me?
Just...
Help a poor friend.
We won't leave the help we received without a response.
Thank you.
Who?
Suleyman Shah's son...
Ertugrul.
Come on.

text: Şu baskılara bir desen bak kızım gel.
english: Look at these steps, come on.
I'll be right back.
You're going away.
Whenever my father says so.
Don't get up for nothing.
You can't stay where you don't want to be.

text: Eğer sizde biraz ağır varsa test toplanıp gidin.
english: If you feel a little bit unwell, go and get tested.

text: Adettendir. Misafire git denmez. Herkes bu yüzden susar.
english: It is a tradition. You should not go to a guest. Everyone keeps quiet because of this.

text: Öyle mi ödeyeceksiniz borcunuzu bu insanlara?
english: Is that how you're going to pay your debt to these people?
The one who gave you your bread and your tent.

text: Sizin yaranızı saran insanlara bunu mu reva görüyorsunuz?
english: Is this what you see in people who have your wound?
I am you.

text: Sen oynaş peşinde koşarken obada kan dökülecek, kan.
english: While you are chasing the toy, the tribe will shed blood. Blood.
Go on your way.
What's wrong?
Really? Selcan.
What did you tell her?
...to hear.

text: Duyulması gereken şeyleri sen mi söylüyorsun?
english: Are you saying what needs to be said?

text: Ben obanın dilliğini düşünüyorum. O kızın bunları çok evvel duyması gerekirdi.
english: I think it is the tribe's fault. That girl should have heard this long ago.
Come on.
The Bey cannot befriend his daughter.
My father always keeps his word.
I will take care of the rest, Selcan.

text: Ezdiğini sandığın o taşların altında kalırsın sonra.
english: You will be crushed under those stones.
Look at her.
I will take my revenge with my own hands.
I can never let you go Titus.

text: ...planımız bozulur. Bu adam kardeşimi öldürdü Kara Toygar. Onu senden canlı istiyorum. Kendi ellerimle alacağım bunu canını.
english: ...our plan will be ruined. This man killed my brother, Kara Toygar. I want him alive from you. I will take him alive with my own hands.

text: Sen hiç merak etme. Onu kurbanlık bir koç gibi bıçağına sunacağım.
english: Don't you worry. I'll offer him to you like a sacrificial lamb.
Kara Toygar is convinced sir.

text: İyileşip misafirlikleri bitene kadar bizden onlara göz kulak olmamızı istedi. Kim olduklarını öğrenebildin mi?
english: He asked us to keep an eye on them until they recovered and......finished their hospitality. Did you find out who they are?

text: Ser verdi sır vermedi domuzun oğlu.
english: He gave us a lot of things but he didn't give us any secrets.

text: Koca Selçuklu'yu telaşlandırdığına göre belli ki bir kuyruk acıları var. Bize düşen bu fırsattan faydalanmaktır.
english: Since you're making the Seljuk people worried, they must be......having a tailache. We should take advantage of this opportunity.
You ordered me to do so, sir.

text: Başka bir diyeceğin yoksa......yol yorgunsun Kurdoğlu. Git dinlen.
english: If you have nothing else to say, you are tired. Go and rest.
Come on.

text: Şivan'dan kurtar beni Akşakoca. İnşallah beyim.
english: Save me from the curse, Ahchuk Hoca. God willing, my Bey.
I think these will be my death.
I'm sorry.
Everything is ready, father.
I put the tools.
We'll go tonight.
Don't think about tomorrow.

text: Akça kocanın neyi nasıl yaptığını da iyice öğrendim. Halime.
english: I learned how Akcakoca did it. Halime.
Calm down, girl.

text: Her vakit yaptığımız gibi, sığındığımız bir yerden kaçacağız. O kadar.
english: We will escape from a place we hide, as we always do. That's all.
Is that all, father?
Is that all?
I don't know what's going on.
Come on.

text: Burayı senin için farklı kılan ne?
english: What makes this place different for you?

text: Bir şey mi var bana söylemediğin?
english: Is there anything you didn't tell me?
I'm so tired.
I'm tired of running away.
Let's start a new life.

text: Kimsenin bizi bulamayacağı yerlere gidelim. Çöllere, denizlere, aşağılara ama gidelim baba. Yeter ki gidelim.
english: Let's go to the places where no one can find us. Let's go to the deserts and seas, but let's go, dad. Let's go.
What happened son?
What happened, Yigit?
We have a guest. He wants to come in.
Peace be upon you.
Peace be upon you.

text: Baba bak, Deli Demir sen ve ablam için kılıç yapmış.
english: Look, father. Deli Demir made a sword for you and my sister.

text: Buraların en iyi demircisidir o. En iyi kılıçları o yapar.
english: He is the best ironman here. He makes the best swords.
No, son.
Ours is just a mishap.
These are the things.
Thank you.
I promise, dear.
Ertugrul Bey is gone.
I asked you not to be without a gun.
It makes him feel comfortable.
...and mine.
Anyway I'm away.
But I'm blind.
If you have a request, don't hesitate.
What will happen in the tribe?
Ertugrul is my son.
That is why.
...should not break his wish.
This is bad.
We'll go this way.

text: Ertuğrul'a şöyle de atlar biraz dinlensin. Çatlayacak hayvanlar.
english: Tell Ertugrul to rest the horses. They'll be very tired.

text: Onun hakkı Halim'e de. Obadan ayrılmadan ona yetişmek istiyor. Cesaretin varsa sen söyle.
english: He's right, Halime. He wants to reach him before he leaves the tribe. If you have the courage, you tell me.
Yes.
We could crash.
The horses will be scared.
Let's breathe by the river.
Let's rest downstairs.
We'll set off before sunset.

text: Ateş akın. Başın gözünün üstüne beyim.
english: Light the fire.
And follow me.
Peace be upon you.
Peace be upon you.
What happened to the buggy?
I found him like that.

text: Kim bilir hangi avcının elinden kaçarken bu hale düşmüş.
english: Who knows what hunter he fell into when he was running away.
I think it's mine.

text: Bu avını elinden kaçırdığına göre pek iyi bir avcı değilsin evlat.
english: You're not a good hunter since you lost this hunt.
Thank you, sir.

text: Ay güzel küslüm, bu koca yiğidin elinden kaçıp kurtuldun ya.
english: Oh, beautiful Küslu. You escaped from this great brave man.
I see.
Come on, Bismillah.
Otherwise, you will be in trouble.
Where are you going?
We will come from the sea and go to the lake.
I'm not.
We'll go to Aleppo.

text: ...se hep gözünüz açık olsun. Kurda kuşa yeme olmayın. Buraların havası pusludur. Pus da kaybolmayın.
english: ...you should always keep your eyes open. Don't be a bird in a cage. The air here is foggy. Don't get lost in the fog.
Will you forgive me for my name?
The most powerful of the Arabs.
Thank you.
We'll set off soon.
No one is waiting for you.
Father, can you bear it?
We have to do this.
May your heart not burn. May your fire not cool.

text: Ayağına taş değmesin, su gibi git.
english: Don't touch your feet with a stone. Go away like water.
I'm so lucky.
Sleep.
No, she is thinking about Halime sister.
Good boy.

text: Burhan bak benimle öyle konuşma. Yeter!
english: Stop it, don't talk to me like that. Enough!
Sit down.
Come on, go to sleep.
A little more.
Before the sun rises...
We'll get what we want.

text: Düşmanını küçük görmek aptallara mahsustur Kara Toygar.
english: It is stupid to underestimate your enemy, Kara Toygar.
...from a masterfully prepared ambush.
No one can be saved Titus.
Nobody.
I will deal with Deli Demir.
Finish the job quietly.
